DOC.brief_summary: This 6-month cross-over trial vitamin D supplementation 38 healthy men woman age 18 year old . The primary aim compare change serum 25 ( OH ) D concentration follow vitamin D supplementation chewable tablet versus pill . Secondary aim evaluate satisfaction adherence vitamin D chewable tablet supplement . Questionnaires physical activity , sunlight exposure dairy product consumption administer adjust confounding factor . A questionnaire administer assess satisfaction pill count evaluate adherence treatment . This research intend test hypothesis vitamin D chewable tablet supplement effective traditional vitamin D pill supplement increase serum 25 ( OH ) D concentration .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Changes Serum 25 ( OH ) D Concentrations Following Vitamin D Supplementation With Chewable Tablets Versus Pills
DOC.criteria: Caucasian men woman ; Aged 18 year old ; Having serum 25 ( OH ) D concentration 75 nmol/L less . Regular consumption supplement contain > 400 IU/d vitamin D last 2 month ; Intestinal malabsorption ; Cirrhosis ; Renal insufficiency ( creatinine clearance < 60 ml/min ) ; Hypercalcemia ; Pregnancy ; Breastfeeding ; Inability provide inform consent .
